name: lihbr-apex
description: Source code of lihbr.com, my personal blog, you should check it out~
author: Lucie Haberer <hello@lihbr.com> (https://lihbr.com)

scripts.build: npm run fonts:decrypt && vite build && vitest run buildIntegrity
scripts.build:staging: npm run build && shx cp src/assets/noindex.robots.txt dist/robots.txt
scripts.fonts:encrypt: tar --gzip --create --file src/assets/fonts.tar src/assets/fonts && openssl enc -aes-256-cbc -e -pbkdf2 -iter 100000 -salt -pass env:LIHBR_APEX -in src/assets/fonts.tar -out src/assets/fonts.tar.enc && rm src/assets/fonts.tar
scripts.fonts:decrypt: openssl enc -aes-256-cbc -d -pbkdf2 -iter 100000 -salt -pass env:LIHBR_APEX -in src/assets/fonts.tar.enc -out src/assets/fonts.tar && tar --gzip --extract --file src/assets/fonts.tar && rm src/assets/fonts.tar
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run types && npm run build && npm run unit
